segments.text: That sink overflow is disgusting, water everywhere like a flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor looks filthy already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe is soaked in it, how gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are climbing for cookies in this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are dirty from the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's dripping down the cabinets, ruining the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand is out, probably to get crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom's dish towel might get contaminated now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole kitchen will smell musty soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar in the open cabinet looks inviting, but not now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're making such a sloppy scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a clean garden, what a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this unclean disaster unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked there might get wet too.
segments.speaker: PAR
